-  IOAF_Int8ToFloat32 

Function# IOAF_Int8ToFloat32

macOS 10.15+

```
void IOAF_Int8ToFloat32(const SInt8 *src, Float32 *dest, unsigned int count);
```

## [See Also](/documentation/kernel/3242801-ioaf_int8tofloat32#see-also)

### [Conversions](/documentation/kernel/3242801-ioaf_int8tofloat32#conversions)

[`IOAF_Float32ToInt8`](/documentation/kernel/3242800-ioaf_float32toint8)[`IOAF_Float32ToNativeInt16`](/documentation/kernel/1416160-ioaf_float32tonativeint16)Converts 32-bit floating point to native 16-bit integer[`IOAF_Float32ToNativeInt24`](/documentation/kernel/1416158-ioaf_float32tonativeint24)Converts 32-bit floating point to native 24-bit integer[`IOAF_Float32ToNativeInt32`](/documentation/kernel/1416171-ioaf_float32tonativeint32)Converts 32-bit floating point to native 32-bit integer[`IOAF_Float32ToSwapInt16`](/documentation/kernel/1416149-ioaf_float32toswapint16)Converts 32-bit floating point to non-native 16-bit integer[`IOAF_Float32ToSwapInt24`](/documentation/kernel/1416187-ioaf_float32toswapint24)Converts 32-bit floating point to non-native 24-bit integer[`IOAF_Float32ToSwapInt32`](/documentation/kernel/1416170-ioaf_float32toswapint32)Converts 32-bit floating point to non-native 32-bit integer[`IOAF_NativeInt16ToFloat32`](/documentation/kernel/1416175-ioaf_nativeint16tofloat32)Converts native 16-bit integer float to 32-bit float[`IOAF_NativeInt24ToFloat32`](/documentation/kernel/1416169-ioaf_nativeint24tofloat32)Converts native 24-bit integer float to 32-bit float[`IOAF_NativeInt32ToFloat32`](/documentation/kernel/1416152-ioaf_nativeint32tofloat32)Converts native 32-bit integer float to 32-bit float[`IOAF_SwapInt16ToFloat32`](/documentation/kernel/1416179-ioaf_swapint16tofloat32)Converts non-native 16-bit integer float to 32-bit float[`IOAF_SwapInt24ToFloat32`](/documentation/kernel/1416164-ioaf_swapint24tofloat32)Converts non-native 24-bit integer float to 32-bit float[`IOAF_SwapInt32ToFloat32`](/documentation/kernel/1416183-ioaf_swapint32tofloat32)Converts non-native 32-bit integer float to 32-bit float
